title: Empowered parliament can lay foundation for brighter future: Rubina Khalid
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 30 (APP): Chairperson Benazir Income Support Programme (BISP), Senator Rubina Khalid, has said that an empowered parliament can lay the foundation for a brighter future and strengthen the pillars of democracy.
In her message on the occasion of the International Day of Parliamentarism, she extended heartfelt congratulations to all parliamentarians, acknowledging the vital role parliamentary institutions play in upholding democratic values and promoting accountability.
“This day highlights the importance of parliaments in ensuring transparency, inclusivity, and public trust,” she said, adding that Pakistan’s Parliament has consistently demonstrated commitment to these ideals.
Senator Rubina Khalid emphasized that the Parliament prioritizes the voice of the people, guarantees representation, and actively addresses national issues. “It bridges the gap between the public and their elected representatives,” she noted.
Reaffirming her belief in democracy, she said, “Through a strong and inclusive parliament, we can strengthen our institutions and work collectively for the progress and prosperity of the nation.”
